title: How Freeze Drying Works
excerpt: A practical overview of freezing, primary drying, and secondary drying stages.
contentMarkdown:
# How Freeze Drying Works

Freeze drying removes water by sublimation under vacuum.

## Three stages
- Freezing
- Primary drying
- Secondary drying

Stable quality requires chamber pressure, shelf temperature and product temperature control.

title: GMP Freeze Dryer Validation Checklist
excerpt: Qualification and documentation checkpoints before production runs.
contentMarkdown:
# GMP Freeze Dryer Validation Checklist

## Required packages
- IQ/OQ/PQ protocols
- Audit trail verification
- Electronic record controls

## Execution
Run representative load mapping and repeatability cycles.
